title: Science: keeping you in the picture
creator_credit: Mark Laughlin, Gil Davidson and Victoria. Education Dept. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Trevor Lunn introduces Janet Hollands and Mark learmonth who provide an explanation of the process by which films and videos for science teachers were selected for inclusion in the Victorian Education Department’s Film and Video Collection. Includes excerpts from titles held in the collection.
